Entries.default: "If you're a spellcasting type, the Dark Cupboard is worth a visit."
"The Watershapers Guild is responsible for the most beautiful works around Neketaka."
"I don't like the way Arkemyr's imps stare at me."
"As far as armorers go, you could do no better than Marihi."
"The clothing from Iolfr's shop is some of the island's finest."
"A dip in the luminous bathhouse would do me a world of good."
"I hear the watershapers are panicked about something."
"Arkemyr, dead? I wonder what will become of his manor."
"Did you see the dragon? By the gods..."
"You don't have to be an artisan to appreciate the craft around Periki's Overlook."
"Some of the island's biggest deals happen in the bathhouse."
"I wonder how far you could see from the top of Arkemyr's manor."
